```{r}
library(anytime)

new_trade<-
  trade%>%
  gather(key = date, value = val, names(trade%>%
                                          select(-c(Commodity))))



new_trade1<-
  new_trade%>%
  separate("date", c("Month","Year"))%>%
  mutate(Month = substr(Month,0,3))%>%
  mutate(Month = match(Month, month.abb))%>%
  mutate(Date = Month,"/",Year ##FIXX

new_trade1
```
